author: dantraMSFT
body:
This PR fixes the logging issue on Linux where logging is intialized before -settingsFile is parsed causing custom log settings to be ignored. (see ConsoleHost.cs and ManagedEntrance.cs)
Fixes https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/6085

The PR also includes basic logging tests for Linux and MacOS.   PSSyslog.psm1 contains the functions to retrieve selected logged items (based on PowerShell's log id and a timestamp) and Logging.Tests.ps1 contains test for Linux and MacOS.

Fixes https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/5312
Fixes https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/5311
